issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: TimelineService V1.5 doesn't come up after HADOOP-15406

fields.description: hadoop-nfs asks for mockito-all and junit for its unit tests but it does not mark the dependency as being required only for tests.
fields.summary: hadoop-nfs dependencies for mockito and junit are not test scope
